bibl.title: Urkunden in Briefform: Chirographum und Epistula im römischen Privatrecht.
The Letter. Law, State, Society and the Epistolary Format in the Ancient World. Proceedings of a Colloquium Held at the American Academy in Rome 28-30.9.2008

bibl.seg: Éva Jakab, Urkunden in Briefform: Chirographum und Epistula im römischen Privatrecht.

Uri Yiftach-Firanko (ed.), The Letter. Law, State, Society and the Epistolary Format in the Ancient World.
